uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor

Class ISlotSpecs

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor.ISlotSpecs

  • public class ISlotSpecs
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that enables implementations of IReasoner to maintain a set of specifications defining the set of slots required for a specific instance-level frame. Existing slot-specifications can be modified as further information is acquired. Once the full set of specifications has been created, they can be used for either initialising or updating the slot-set for the relevant frame.

    • Method Detail

      • absorb

        public void absorb(CFrame frameType)
        Absorbs all slot-related definitions associated with the specified concept-level frame or any of it's ancestors into the current set of slot-specifications, creating new specifications where necessary. Absorbed definitions may include:
        • Concept-level slot definitions
        • Instance-level slot default-values

        The new slot-definition information will be used to update existing slot-specifications as follows:

        • The most-specific of the slot value-types will be retained (as defined by CValue.subsumedBy(CValue))
        • The most-specific of the cardinalities will be retained (as defined by CCardinality.moreRestrictiveThan(CCardinality))
        • The activation will be the "strongest" of the existing and new activations (see CActivation.getStrongest(uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.CActivation))
        • The editability will be the "strongest" of the existing and new editabilities (see CEditability.getStrongest(uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.CEditability))
        Parameters:
        frameType - Concept-level frame whose slot-related definitions are to be absorbed

      • absorbAll

        public void absorbAll(java.util.List<CFrame> frameTypes)
        Absorbs all slot-related definitions associated with the specified concept-level frames or any of it's ancestors, into the current set of slot-specifications, creating new specifications where necessary. See absorb(CFrame) for description of the absorption process.
        Parameters:
        frameTypes - Concept-level frames whose slot-related definitions are to be absorbed

      • initialise

        public void initialise(IFrame frame)
        Initialises the slot-set, including value-types, editabilities, activations and fixed slot-values, on the specified instance-level frame, using the current set of slot-specifications.
        Parameters:
        frame - Instance-level frame to be initialised

      • update

        public ISlotOps update(IFrame frame,
                       ISlotOps ops)
        Updates the slot-set, including value-types, editabilities, activations and fixed slot-values, on the specified instance-level frame, using the current set of slot-specifications.

        NOTE: Even if the required update operations (as specified via the relevant parameter) do not include slot-value updates, removals of asserted slot-values may still occur as a result of either slot removals or value-type updates.

        Parameters:
        frame - Instance-level frame to be updated
        ops - Required update operations
        Returns:
        Types of update produced
